definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Ask a cold not cold My hands heat for you.
sentences.chinese: 问一声冷不冷我的双手为你加温。

sentences.english: This product is glass cotton exert adhesive, heating curing the carpet shaped materials.
sentences.chinese: 本品为玻璃棉施加粘合剂，加温固化成型的毡状材料。

sentences.english: Prohibit using a direct fire or liquating paint under airtight condition.
sentences.chinese: 禁止使用明火加温或在密闭状态下熔解漆料。

sentences.english: No heat, brushing with the Rolling Brush, or brush can be direct.
sentences.chinese: 无需加温，用滚刷或毛刷直接涂刷即可。

sentences.english: Wing leading slats use hot air from the pneumatic system.
sentences.chinese: 前缘缝翼用增压系统的热引气加温。

sentences.english: The machine adopts enclosed heating and vacuum forming to make the vamp fit with the last.
sentences.chinese: 该机利用密封式加温，真空成型，使鞋面与楦头吻合。

sentences.english: Steam is water that’s heated to two hundred twelve degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 水加温到212华氏度就变成了水蒸气。

sentences.english: Adopt two-sided to heat, two-way temperature control, Make temperature more even.
sentences.chinese: 采用上下加温，双温控制，使温度更加均匀。

sentences.english: Top of the fence design to facilitate the assembly of heating equipment.
sentences.chinese: 上方防护网设计，方便加温器材的装配。

sentences.english: If granulated tin is used the reaction may have to be initiated by careful warming.
sentences.chinese: 如果所用的是粒状锡，那么须靠小心加温来引起反应。

sentences.english: Put it in a glass and warm it in a bowL of hot water.
sentences.chinese: 可以将药盛在玻璃杯里，将它放在一碗热水中加温。

definition: cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
